content.description:
Completely different rock then the rest of fairview...it looks like Yosemite style granite when you get close. The crux is probably passing the second bolt

Don't just stop at the anchor chains...it is defiantly a necessary summit!!
content.location: You will see the small blank pinnacle on your right as you walk to Tatooine.

content.description: Fun bouldery start, then over all too quickly!
content.protection: Two Bolts and Anchor w/ rap rings
content.location: Same boulder as Size Matters Not. On the face to the right of SMN.

content.description:
Beautiful finger crack that splits one of the most predominant blocks seen from the parking lot.

Beta is pretty simple: Start at the base of crack and follow it to the top. The business is at the bottom (both moves and hard to place gear).
content.protection: Tips sized cams and nuts up to hand sized cams.
content.location: One of the largest, highest blocks seen from the parking lot. Its right of the main trail that takes you to Tatooine. Pretty close to Size Matters Not.

climbs.name: The Cure
climbs.fa: Eric Odenthal, 1/11/21, bolted GU solo, belay by Kevin Graves

content.description: Climb the cool rail up and left, mantle with a hidden bolt then a bolt above to protect the second and anchor out left out of view. Crux mayÂ be getting to the fourth bolt.
content.location: Twenty feet left of the finger crack, High Desert Hospitality.
